name: py-torchgeo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-einops
dependencies.description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.

dependencies.name: py-fiona
dependencies.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.

dependencies.name: py-jsonargparse
dependencies.description:
An extension to python's argparse which simplifies parsing of
configuration options from command line arguments, json configuration
files (yaml or jsonnet supersets), environment variables and hard-coded
defaults.

dependencies.name: py-kornia
dependencies.description: Open Source Differentiable Computer Vision Library for PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-lightly
dependencies.description: A deep learning package for self-supervised learning.

dependencies.name: py-lightning
dependencies.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependencies.name: py-pyproj
dependencies.description:
Python interface to PROJ (cartographic projections and coordinate
transformations library).

dependencies.name: py-rasterio
dependencies.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.

dependencies.name: py-rtree
dependencies.description: R-Tree spatial index for Python GIS.

dependencies.name: py-segmentation-models-pytorch
dependencies.description:
Python library with Neural Networks for Image Segmentation based on
PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-shapely
dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.

dependencies.name: py-timm
dependencies.description: (Unofficial) PyTorch Image Models.

dependencies.name: py-torch
dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependencies.name: py-torchmetrics
dependencies.description: Machine learning metrics for distributed, scalable PyTorch applications.

dependencies.name: py-torchvision
dependencies.description: Image and video datasets and models for torch deep learning.

dependencies.name: gdal
dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-laspy
dependencies.description: Native Python ASPRS LAS read/write library.

dependencies.name: opencv
dependencies.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependencies.name: py-pycocotools
dependencies.description: Official APIs for the MS-COCO dataset.

dependencies.name: py-pyvista
dependencies.description: Easier Pythonic interface to VTK.

dependencies.name: py-radiant-mlhub
dependencies.description: A Python client for Radiant MLHub.

dependencies.name: py-rarfile
dependencies.description: RAR archive reader for Python.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-image
dependencies.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-zipfile-deflate64
dependencies.description: Extract Deflate64 ZIP archives with Python's zipfile API.

dependencies.name: py-ipywidgets
dependencies.description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook

dependencies.name: py-nbsphinx
dependencies.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependencies.name: py-pytorch-sphinx-theme
dependencies.description: PyTorch Sphinx Theme.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx
dependencies.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependencies.name: py-black
dependencies.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependencies.name: py-flake8
dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependencies.name: py-isort
dependencies.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependencies.name: py-pydocstyle
dependencies.description: Python docstring style checker.

dependencies.name: py-pyupgrade
dependencies.description: A tool to automatically upgrade syntax for newer versions.

dependencies.name: py-mypy
dependencies.description: Optional static typing for Python.

dependencies.name: py-nbmake
dependencies.description: Pytest plugin for testing notebooks.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-cov
dependencies.description: Pytest plugin for measuring coverage.

dependencies.name: py-omegaconf
dependencies.description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependencies.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: open3d
dependencies.description: Open3D: A Modern Library for 3D Data Processing.

dependencies.name: py-tensorboard
dependencies.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.
